column5: My buddy and I have a 55' ( sleeps 8 ) houseboat reserved leaving Hudson on Lac Seul for the week of July 2 ( we leave at noon ) - July 9 ( have to have the boat back to the dock by 8:00 a.m.). We had three " drop outs" and therefore posting this in case any die hard walleye hunters want to sign on- I peg per person costs for the week rental at $500.00 . Contact me for more information if interested: Brian Patton : [email protected] best regards, JBP
